description.raw:
For the drcsim tasks that do not involve manipulation, there is speculation that simplifying the dynamic model of the hands may improve performance. This pull request adds a parameter to be able to specify whether the fingers should have revolute joints or fixed joints. I also add a parameter called thumb_angle that can relocate the default position of the thumb so it is not in view of the camera when frozen.

This will break old versions of drcsim, so it will require a simulataneous release.

I also add a parameter called thumb_angle that can relocate the default position of the thumb so it is not in view of the camera when frozen.

This will break old versions of drcsim, so it will require a simulataneous release.

title.raw: Generate quasi-static model: frozen fingers, but working cameras
title.html: Generate quasi-static model: frozen fingers, but working cameras
